snippet: MICHEL--Ernest W. The Zises family mourns the loss of a great Jewish hero, leader and dear friend. Our condolences to Amy Goldberg Michel and the entire Michel Family worldwide. The Zises Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: MICHEL--Ernest W. The Zises family mourns the loss of a great Jewish hero, leader and dear friend. Our condolences to Amy Goldberg Michel and the entire Michel Family worldwide. The Zises Family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MICHEL, ERNEST W
